definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc

pinyin: guang3 fan4 xing4 jiao1 lu:4 zheng4

sentences.english: Heme , the prosthetic group of the hemoglobin, has been used widely and importantly.
sentences.chinese: 血红素是血红蛋白的辅基，有极其广泛和重要的应用。

sentences.english: Loess is widely distributed in China, and it mainly lies in the central and western regions.
sentences.chinese: 黄土在我国分布广泛，而且主要分布在中西部地区。

sentences.english: The new rocket was extensively tested and debugged by the army.
sentences.chinese: 这种新式火箭由军方进行了广泛的测试和调试。

sentences.english: Nokia said the N8 would be widely available in coming weeks."The
sentences.chinese: 诺基亚称，N8将在未来几周内得到广泛应用。

sentences.english: This method can be applied in rifted basin with abundant effusive rocks.
sentences.chinese: 该方法在喷出岩较发育的断陷盆地中可以广泛应用。

sentences.english: Fourth, Northeast anti-Japanese national united front is characterized by its universality.
sentences.chinese: 第四，东北抗日民族统一战线具有广泛性。

sentences.english: Paralanguage , including body language, has been extensively studied in social psychology.
sentences.chinese: 包括身体语言，已被广泛地研究社会心理学。

sentences.english: Compared with numerical control, its broad future in application is illustrated.
sentences.chinese: 并与数控机械加工比较，说明它适用的广泛前景。

sentences.english: Mobilize the whole society to participate in a wide range of development, needs for mobilizing the masses.
sentences.chinese: 发动全社会广泛的参与发展，需要进行群众动员。

sentences.english: The technology of line reinforced by the temporary beam in the D pattern and container bridge jacking has been widely applied.
sentences.chinese: 型便梁加固线路顶进箱桥施工技术已得到广泛应用。

sentences.english: This problem, there is extensive catholicity in social life.
sentences.chinese: 这个新问题，在社会生活中有广泛的普遍性。

sentences.english: Medium-frequency power supply has been widely used in industrial heating.
sentences.chinese: 中频电源已广泛应用于加热领域。

sentences.english: The glazed roof supported by latticed shell has been widely used in many kinds of architecture.
sentences.chinese: 以网壳为支撑构架的玻璃采光顶使用广泛。

sentences.english: The cylindrical container has a wide -mouth opening for easy filling and convenient access to the contents.
sentences.chinese: 圆柱容器广泛张口，方便灌装和方便地访问内容。

sentences.english: Plant lectins are widely distributed in plant kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 植物凝集素广泛分布于植物界。

sentences.english: The latter release turned out to be the most popular among filesharers.
sentences.chinese: 而后者就是在文件共享者中传播的最广泛的一个版本。

definition: to attach importance to sth/to value
domestic and international/at home and abroad
to give rise to/to lead to/to cause/to arouse
all walks of life/all social circles
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
ever since a long time ago
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
